scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/index.server.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external zod --external react --external @neynar/nodejs-sdk --external starknet --external @react-native-async-storage/async-storage --external wagmi/connectors --external viem --external wagmi --external pg --external redis && npm run build:native
scripts.build:native: tsup src/index.native.ts --format cjs,esm --external zod --external react --external @neynar/nodejs-sdk --external starknet --external @react-native-async-storage/async-storage --external wagmi/connectors --external viem --external wagmi --external pg
